directions: Heat oil in heavy large pot over medium heat. Add onion; sauté 2 minutes. Add tomatoes; sauté 4 minutes. Increase heat to high; add wine. Boil until reduced by half, about 2 minutes. Add clam juice; simmer 3 minutes. Add clams; cover and cook 3 minutes. Mix in fennel, bell pepper, and zucchini. Add mussels, sausage, and olives. Cover; bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium; simmer until shellfish open, about 5 minutes (discard any that do not open). Sprinkle with parsley and serve.
ingredients: 2 large ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded, chopped
1 cup matchstick-size strips red bell pepper (about 1/2 large pepper)
1 pound smoked linguiça or chorizo sausage, cut into matchstick-size strips
title: Spicy Shellfish and Sausage Stew
